sentences.en: "I know you don't believe me," I said resignedly.
sentences.cn: “我知道你不相信我，”我无可奈何地说。

sentences.en: "It's not that I don't believe you, Meg," Jack said, unconvincingly.
sentences.cn: “并不是我不相信你，梅格。”杰克口是心非地说道。

sentences.en: And would you believe it, he's younger than me!
sentences.cn: 你信吗？他比我年轻！

sentences.en: believe it or not, the speaker was none other than Horace.
sentences.cn: 信不信由你，演讲者就是霍勒斯。

sentences.en: believe me, it is well worth the effort.
sentences.cn: 相信我的话，这值得花工夫。

sentences.en: Clarke could hardly believe his luck as he put the ball into the empty net.
sentences.cn: 克拉克简直不敢相信运气那么好，竟把球打进了空袋。

sentences.en: Did you honestly believe that I’d be stupid enough to do that?
sentences.cn: 你真的认为我会傻到做那样的事情吗？。

sentences.en: he says he is left of centre, but don't you believe it.
sentences.cn: 他说他的立场观点中间偏左，别信他。

sentences.en: He'd telephoned with some phoney excuse she didn't believe for a minute.
sentences.cn: 他找了某个她根本不会相信的借口给她打电话。

sentences.en: His opponents believe he is definitely on the run.
sentences.cn: 对手认为他必败无疑。

sentences.en: How can you expect me to believe your promises?
sentences.cn: 你怎能指望我相信你的承诺？

sentences.en: I believe he is most painfully anxious about Diana.
sentences.cn: 我相信他肯定非常担心黛安娜。

sentences.en: I believe he was concerned in all those matters you mention.
sentences.cn: 我认为你提到的那些事都与他有关。

sentences.en: I believe I am capable of calculating the political consequences accurately.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我能准确预料此事的政治后果。

sentences.en: I believe I have the talent to make it.
sentences.cn: 我相信自己有成功的天分。

sentences.en: I believe in seasoning food before putting it on the table.
sentences.cn: 我认为在把食物端上餐桌前应该先调味。

sentences.en: I believe in the maxim "if it ain't broke, don't fix it".
sentences.cn: 我相信这样一条箴言：“不破不修”。

sentences.en: I believe that a journalist should be completely objective.
sentences.cn: 我认为新闻记者不应当有丝毫偏见。

sentences.en: I believed him, even though his story sounded unlikely.
sentences.cn: 我相信了他，尽管他的话听上去难以置信。

sentences.en: I don’t believe a word of it (=  I think it is completely untrue  ) .
sentences.cn: 我一句话也不相信。

sentences.en: I don't believe in censorship of the arts.
sentences.cn: 我认为不应对艺术进行审查。

sentences.en: Police believe the killer punched her to death with his bare hands.
sentences.cn: 警方认为她是被凶手活活用拳头打死的。

sentences.en: They seriously believe that capital punishment is a deterrent.
sentences.cn: 他们真的相信死刑具有威慑作用。

sentences.en: they're still arguing, would you believe it?.
sentences.cn: 他们还在争论，真是怪事!。

sentences.en: those who believe in God.
sentences.cn: 相信上帝的人。

sentences.en: You shouldn’t believe everything you read.
sentences.cn: 你不应尽信书上看来的东西。

phrases.phrase: be unable to (或 be hardly able to) believe
phrases.tran_cn: 无法相信，简直不敢相信（表示对某事感到惊奇）

phrases.phrase: be unable to (或 be hardly able to) believe one's e
phrases.tran_cn: 无法（或简直不敢）相信自己的眼睛（或耳朵）（表示对所见或所闻感到惊讶）
认为（某事）是正确的（或合适的、必要的）
信不信由你（表示说的话令人吃惊）
（请你）相信我的话（强调话语的真实性）
[口语][用以加强语气]相信我的话，相信我说的是真的(或算数的)；真的
你会相信吗？（对所说之事表示惊讶）

trans.tran_cn: 相信，信任，认为，猜想，有宗教信仰
trans.tran_en: to be sure that something is true or that someone is telling the truth
to be sure that something is true or that someone is telling the truth
